body:
Looking for expert **MLB Predictions** for 2021? Then you'll love this resource. Developed by one of our co-founders, who is a full time professional bettor, we have an incredible MLB Model. You'll get daily moneyline and total predictions for every game of the season. - - - ## **Today's MLB Predictions** We'll automate the outputs, so they look better, in a few days. Excuse the screenshot to start. But bookmark the page and hit it every morning (US time). They should be live by 7am in the East, at the latest. Often much earlier.
- - -
Want **the biggest promos?** Start with **$2,000** in bonus bets. **JOIN POINTSBET NOW!**
- - - ### **Want more insight? Get the weekly email.** ### **We promise it's worth your time.** ###
title: MLB Predictions: Your Choice Model For MLB Picks & Parlays
